title: Senior Concept Artist
content:
Zynga is searching for a world-class Senior Concept Artist to add their talent to a team of game enthusiasts!  As an Artist, you are capable of creating high-quality assets quickly and effectively. You have a passion for art, and inspire other artists with both your talent and enthusiasm.
Main Responsibilities:

Build top-of-the-line game artwork at all stages of the pipeline, including early concept art (Characters, environments & UI), and final game artwork and UI assets
Working closely with artwork from third-party vendors, providing feedback and training when needed
Communicating closely with the Art Director and working in tandem with them dailyActing as a core advisor to the overall creative vision of the game, alongside other creative field leads on the team
Actively analyze other top-performing, innovative games and genres in the marketplace to identify and understand trends and behaviors with other developers and audiences and then apply that insight to our product development.
Create designs that consider and maximize the effectiveness of typography, icons, grid, and color systems to layout screens for best results. Apply principles of Visual and Graphic Design (contrast, alignment, repetition, and proximity) to increase ease of use.
Approach deliverables, for example, UI Kits, with a systems-oriented mindset that is organized, easy to use by all, and extensible for the future.
Clear and smooth communication across to the other fields (Engineering, Production, etc.) to keep the team in alignment
Maintaining and Contributing to a healthy and happy team environment

 
Desired Skills and Experience:


6+ years of experience as a concept & UI artist â€” please include your portfolio with relevant industry/personal work.
Excellent eye for composition, color theory, design
Strong rendering skills, and ability to adapt to different art styles & UI design experience
Photoreal and Hyperreal painting and rendering skills highly valued for this role
Flexible mastery of art for different subject matter (Characters, Environments, Props, UI) highly valued for this role
Strong ability to render identifiable human likenesses (ie brand-specific actors and characters)
Ability to visualize ideas from others quickly and clearly during conceptual phases in storyboards/mockups
Ability to quickly identify problems and suggest solutions in pitches, art reviews and impromptu conversations
Strong organizational skills, and ability to keep pace with management and production resources, tracking and documentation
Ability to create and maintain effective process documentation
A capacity to come up with unique and creative ideas in your work
BFA or equivalent degree
Knowledge of Adobe Suite


Additional skills:


Previous experience working with IP/likenesses
Previous experience working in Fantasy genres, a plus
3D texture painting
Graphic design knowledge
Interest in puzzle genre of mobile gam
Interest in Racing games and  mobile games
The ability to integrate basic art into Unity, a plus
Knowledge of Maya, a plus
Understanding of animation principles and aesthetics of Mobile Games, a plus


 
What we offer you:


Work in a studio that has complete P&L ownership of games
Create next-gen games that will be played and loved by millions of players around the world
Work in a collaborative team that invests in your development and growth on-the-job
Competitive salary, bonus plan and Employee Stock Purchase Plan
20 days annual leave + company holidays
Extended medical coverage that includes OPD, dental, vision and telehealth
Group Life, Disability and Critical Illness insurance
Equitable Childcare facilities for all employees
Virtual mental health and neurodiversity support programs
Family planning and nurturing support programs
 Comprehensive leave options and flexible working hours to ensure work life balance.
Keep your health on track with our wellbeing programs covering fitness expenses and complimentary meals served around the clock
Employee Assistance Programs
Around the year employee events and casual dress every single day
A diverse team of friendly, fun and supportive co-workers to work with and, impact millions of daily players
Re-engage with your special interest by being a part of our employee resource groups that connect Zyngites through inclusivity, culture, lifestyle and fun


 
 Zynga does not  engage in financial exchanges during the recruitment or onboarding process. We do not conduct job interviews over third-party messaging apps such as Telegram, WhatsApp or others. We will never ask you for your personal or financial information over unofficial chat channels. Our in-house recruitment team only contacts individuals via official company email addresses (i.e., via a zynga.com or naturalmotion.com email domain).
If you believe you have been the victim of a scam, you may wish to contact the authorities. In the United States, you may file a complaint with the FBI. More information is available here: https://www.ic3.gov.

demographic_questions.description:
As part of our Diversity and Inclusion Strategy we would like to collect demographic information from job candidates to identify and implement strategies to understand and improve equal opportunity for all at Zynga. Completion of this information is entirely voluntary and any details you provide will not be considered in the hiring process. Zynga will anonymize demographic information for reporting and analytics to gain a better understanding of our hiring process. This  information will only be used internally within Zynga and stored securely on our systems.  

For Zynga’s full privacy notice, click here for US Job Applicant privacy notice and here for the Outside of the US Job Applicant Privacy Notice . You can email Privacy@zynga.com for more information regarding the collections and use of your data.
